attributes.action: All trans people in the UK under 18 to have full medical access to transitioning
attributes.additional_details:
Currently the stats for the health of Transgender people in the UK are shocking. 

I remember what it was like to have barriers in my way by the governments act when I was u18 and it’s time for a change that allows people to live comfortably in their skin
attributes.background: Following the news on Liz Truss’s plan to ban the transition of trans youth under the age of 18. To debate and fight against this ban, through trans rights and equality rights. All young trans people under 18 to have full access to medical care, treatment and surgery to undergo their transition.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318025
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318175
